actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-391.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3648) to improve the cost effectiveness of the National Railroad Passenger Corporation, to authorize appropriations for such Corporation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3648 (National Railroad Passenger Corporation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3648) to improve the cost effectiveness of the National Railroad Passenger Corporation, to authorize appropriations for such Corporation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.
